plot: Cromartie kidnaps Sarah and races to Mexico to find John. When Derek, Cameron and Ellison discover what has happened, they come to their defense - which leads to one final, deadly confrontation with Cromartie.

In this episode that replays the same day's events from numerous viewpoints, John, growingly alienated with life and both unable and unwilling to face his own destiny, runs away with Riley for a getaway to Mexico where he wants to show her the life he wishes he had, unaware that Cromartie is hot on their tail, and has taken Sarah hostage. Elsewhere, Derek and Cameron are forced to team up to find John and Riley before Cromartie does, while Ellison finally discovers that Sarah is alive when John and Riley land in jail from a barroom brawl, which reveals their location to Cromartie.—Anonymous

After John and Sarah squabble over Riley, John decides to take Riley on a road trip to the Mexican village where he and his mother lived for a year and a half. While there, they get arrested however. During this time, Sarah is kidnapped by Cromartie and they set off for Mexico to find John. Ellison also lands in Mexico after John's real name shows up in an arrest report. Cameron and Derek also track them all down, leading to a major battle with Cromartie.—garykmcd
